author: trygvis
msg: o Adding some utility scripts for debugging Derby and for creating the schema.
o Removing CLOB references. Will instead just store the exception messages in
the columns instead of the entire stack trace.
o Adding table names to all classes.
o Adding explicit imports on the queries. Silences some JPOX warnings.

author: ggregory
msg: Better unit test coverage for StrTokenizer.java.

author: deweese
msg: 1) Fixed misplaced glyph for mixed LTR and RTL text.
2) Fixed NPE when closing open window without entering anything.
3) New test for Bidi checking for misplaced glyph.
